Property.name: Debug
Property.HelpText: Enables ingame controller debugging information.

Property.name: DisableMouse
Property.HelpText: Completely disable all mouse-related input in the game.

Property.name: DeadzoneL
Property.HelpText: Left analog stick deadzone (from 0 to 32767).

Property.name: DeadzoneR
Property.HelpText: Right analog stick deadzone (from 0 to 32767).

Property.name: RadialL
Property.HelpText: Enables full range of motion on the left analog stick.

Property.name: RadialR
Property.HelpText: Enables full range of motion on the right analog stick.

Property.name: TriggerThreshold
Property.HelpText: Trigger to digital conversion threshold (from 0 to 32767).

Property.name: RumbleFactor
Property.HelpText: Rumble multiplier. Values below 0 or above 1 have no effect.

Property.name: MegaRumble
Property.HelpText: Always fire both motors while rumbling, never independently.

Property.name: RumbleMinTime
Property.HelpText: Minimum rumble time (from 0 to 32767).

Property.name: AllowKeyboard
Property.HelpText: Enable keyboard input for this controller.
